sources.title: A Secret to Keep (High School THRILLER full movie German, new movies German completely new 2024)

metadata.Plot: Louie has just killed her boss, it was an accident. Gotta hide the deed, she can't go to jail. Experience the fear of discovery and the pain of guilt as she struggles to keep her secret from a nosey neighbor and colleague. This film is a mysterious yet witty psychological study of guilt and self preservation as Louie finds herself in crazy situations with a strange bedfellow. The film's finale is the biggest secret of all.
metadata.Actors: Catherine Curtin, Matthew Cowles, Max Lodge, Ron Numi
